Bob Chinn directs this comedy which plays as a bizarre WW2 prequel (sort of) to the Johnny Wadd series. Beautifully filmed on location in Hawaii, it concerns the adventures of hapless old Johnnie, a sailor washed ashore on a seemingly deserted island and then taken prisoner by an Axis/Nippon alliance of Guards. There he and two other American prisoners are subjected to torture, which inevitably involves sex. One of the guards is Seka, hamming it up hilariously as a brutal German Guard ("Don't come in me, you American Swine!!!!"). It's classy film, although the eroticism isn't quite as hot as you'd expect from Bob Chinn, and you'd expect some outdoor scenes given the location. The opening scene is easily the best - A flashback scene that Holmes has of his former lover, Mai Lin, set in a luxurious oriental bordello. Jade East in the closer is incredibly cute and perky as well. Contains light S&M or B&D themes. At one point Sue Carol masturbates with the handle of a gun. Overall 3.10 on the imperator scale; very impressive as a film, where else in porn would you get WW2 footage mixed in with the action ?
